newsitem.title: UK: David Glass says in talks Hercules.
newsitem.headline: David Glass says in talks Hercules.

text.p: Britain's David Glass Associates Plc said on Wednesday it had received an approach from Hercules Property Services Plc which may lead to an offer being made.

Property company David Glass said Hercules had indicated that if an offer was made it was likely to be on a share-for-share basis valuing the company at around 153 pence per share with a full cash alternative.
It said the cash alternative was not likely to be more than 133 pence per share.
Shares in David Glass stood 1.0 pence lower at 129-1/2 at 1445 GMT.
